title: What are the best Hindi rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Contrary to the popular belief, there is surely much more than booze, girls and expensive cars even in the Desi Hip Hop scene! You need to explore beyond the commercial songs for that though. Here are some of the best rap songs in my opinion! (Not in any particular order) I am going to mention my favourite rap song from various desi hip hop artists!Some of these songs have raps in english/punjabi also apart from Hindi but they come with the pure Desi Feel. 1] Bandook - Badshah & Raxstar Both Badshah and Raxstar’s verses are dope! To give you a teaser, here’s my fav part from Badshah’s rap, “Loot ke auroon ke paise bana tu rich (boy)Uske hathon me triggerDarr, na de wo khich (boy)Meri salah tujhe bas yahi haike soch samajh ke kariyo jo bhi karna haiCoz Karma is a bitch (boy)”Do also check out Badshah’s Inception and Baatcheet. Also Check out Raxstar’s rap from the song Queen (T series)  2] Naezy - Haq Hai Also check out his songs Aafat and Asal Hustle, you wont be disappointed.  3] Divine - Jungli SherHis other track along with Naezy called Mere Gully Mai is another super raw rap from the streets of Mumbai.  4] Pardhaan - Darr Jata Hoon Must check his tracks - Meri baari Hai, Deewana Mujhsa Nahi & Rooh.  5] Desi Beam (Rap Crew)You will love this! Hindi+Punjabi+English+HaryanviKiller Stuff!!  6] Muhfaad - Sach too much hai New Rapper on the scene!  7] Bohemia - Kali DenaliNeedless to say, almost all his tracks are worth listening!He’s the father of Desi Hip Hop for a reason, no?  8] Raftaar - TVF Media Labs Cute Vol 1Something very different and enjoyable! Brilliant as always! Must also check out his songs Swag Mera Desi, Allah Veh and Stand Up!  9] Ikka Singh- SapneDo check out this song, deep lyrics, sick track!  10] Yo Yo Honey Singh - Manali TranceIf you are looking for some trippy stuff, do check this one!  11] Emiway - ChatrangPure TAPORI RAP! Do Check this out!  I guess I’m going to stop now.  To sum it up, there are a lot of brilliant Desi rap songs out there, you just need to explore! Do let me know if there is any song I missed out! Cheers!
